greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Odd bisection of A263272.
program: def a030102(n): return 0 if n==0 else int(''.join(map(str, digits(n, 3)[1:][::-1])), 3)
return 1 if n==1 else reduce(mul, [1 if i==3 else i**f[i] for i in f])
def a(n): return a263273(2*(2*n + 1))/2 # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 23 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 05 2015
